nodes.speaker: narrator
nodes.text: Another customer is approaching. They think so little when it comes to spending their chips you’d think they’re freshly baked.

nodes.speaker: gingerbread
nodes.text: My finances are crumbling exactly like an extra soft cookie.

nodes.speaker: player
nodes.text: Excellent bet my guy. Your skills are sharper than the edges of cookie cutter. Would someone so smart like you happen to know anything circulating around?

nodes.speaker: gingerbread
nodes.text: I have heard that {fighterA} is going to inject certain subatance (flour) before the match with {fighterB}.
